com.github.pwittchen.prefser.library

Class Prefser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pwittchen.prefser.library.Prefser

  • public class Prefser
extends java.lang.Object
    Prefser is a wrapper for Android SharedPreferences with object serialization and RxJava Observables.

    It uses mechanism of SharedPreferences to store primitives and Gson library to store arrays, lists and custom objects. Thanks to RxJava, Prefser is able to listen changes in SharedPreferences and provides Observable data, which can be subscribed and returns key of the changed value.

    Basic Usage: 

      Prefser prefser = new Prefser(context);
  prefser.put("key", value);
  String getValue = prefser.get("key", String.class, defaultValue);
    Subscribing Observable of SharedPreferences: 
      prefser.observeDefaultPreferences()
      .observeOn(AndroidSchedulers.mainThread())
      .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io())
      ...
      .subscribe(...);

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Prefser(android.content.Context context)
      Creates Prefser object with default SharedPreferences from PreferenceManager.
      Prefser(android.content.Context context, JsonConverter jsonConverter)
      Creates Prefser object with default SharedPreferences from PreferenceManager.
      Prefser(android.content.SharedPreferences sharedPreferences)
      Creates Prefser object with provided object of SharedPreferences, which will be wrapped.
      Prefser(android.content.SharedPreferences sharedPreferences, JsonConverter jsonConverter)
      Creates Prefser object with provided object of SharedPreferences, which will be wrapped with JsonConverter implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferences

        public android.content.SharedPreferences getPreferences()
        Returns SharedPreferences in case, we want to manipulate them without Prefser.
        Returns:
        SharedPreferences instance of SharedPreferences

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String key)
        Checks if preferences contains value with a given key
        Parameters:
        key - provided key
        Returns:
        true if preferences contains key and false if not

      • getAndObserve

        public <T> <any> getAndObserve(java.lang.String key,
                               java.lang.Class classOfT,
                               T defaultValue)
        Gets value from SharedPreferences with a given key and type as a RxJava Observable, which can be subscribed if value is not found, we can return defaultValue. Emit preference as first element of the stream even if preferences wasn't changed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type of the preference (e.g. String)
        Parameters:
        key - key of the preference
        classOfT - class of T (e.g. String.class)
        defaultValue - default value of the preference (e.g. "" or "undefined")
        Returns:
        Observable value from SharedPreferences associated with given key or default value

      • observe

        public <T> <any> observe(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.Class classOfT,
                         T defaultValue)
        Gets value from SharedPreferences with a given key and type as a RxJava Observable, which can be subscribed if value is not found, we can return defaultValue.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type of the preference (e.g. String)
        Parameters:
        key - key of the preference
        classOfT - class of T (e.g. String.class)
        defaultValue - default value of the preference (e.g. "" or "undefined")
        Returns:
        Observable value from SharedPreferences associated with given key or default value

      • get

        public <T> T get(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.Class classOfT,
                 T defaultValue)
        Gets value from SharedPreferences with a given key and type if value is not found, we can return defaultValue.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type of the preference (e.g. String)
        Parameters:
        key - key of the preference
        classOfT - class of T (e.g. String.class)
        defaultValue - default value of the preference (e.g. "" or "undefined")
        Returns:
        value from SharedPreferences associated with given key or default value

      • observeDefaultPreferences

        public <any> observeDefaultPreferences()
        returns RxJava Observable from default SharedPreferences used inside Prefser object. You can subscribe this Observable and every time, when SharedPreferences will change, subscriber will be notified about that (e.g. in call() method) and you will be able to read key of the value, which has been changed.
        Returns:
        Observable with String containing key of the value in default SharedPreferences

      • observe

        public <any> observe(android.content.SharedPreferences sharedPreferences)
        returns RxJava Observable from SharedPreferences. You can subscribe this Observable and every time, when SharedPreferences will change, subscriber will be notified about that (e.g. in call() method) and you will be able to read key of the value, which has been changed.
        Parameters:
        sharedPreferences - instance of SharedPreferences to be observed
        Returns:
        Observable with String containing key of the value in SharedPreferences

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.Object value)
        Puts value to the SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        key - key under which value will be stored
        value - value to be stored

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes value defined by a given key.
        Parameters:
        key - key of the preference to be removed

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all SharedPreferences.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns number of all items stored in SharedPreferences.
        Returns:
        number of all stored items
